keyMappings:
" Closing Tabs
map ww removeTab count=15
map wq closeTabsOnLeft
map we closeTabsOnRight
map W closeOtherTabs
map u removeTab
map U restoreTab

" Scrolling Fast
map J scrollDown count=4
map K scrollUp count=4

" History
map h goBack
map l goForward

" Reload
map R reload hard

" Pages
map gh goPrevious
map gl goNext
 
" Tabs
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map b visitPreviousTab
unmap g0
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
unmap g$
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

" mimic American keyboard layout
map - enterFindMode

" Marks
" remapping, since backtick isn't properly supported
map ö Marks.activateGotoMode

" unmap unneeded stuff
unmap d
unmap B
unmap gt
unmap gT
unmap T
unmap o
unmap O
unmap `
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap /
unmap ^
unmap >>
unmap <<
unmap [[
unmap ]]
